To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Cyclonus and Scourge
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

The water of the North Atlantic Ocean brushes lightly against the continent
of Africa, and the nature and quiet, shows calmness, that you never would
have guessed, with the recent battle. The silence is brocken though, by an
engines roar, and even more so by a cackling idiot. "If ya dont hurry
Speedbreaker, Im gonna beat you to the base" screams a grey car as he nears
the end of the Continent. He hits a pile of rocks, and jumps, smoothely
transforming into a flying robot. The robot looks truly magnificent, if not
for half of what is supposed to be a face was missing. Speedbreaker then
catches up, and does the same, he is in very good shape compared to his
comrade, "Youre built for speed, im just built to look good Wildrider" the
robot says quickly. Now that they are not in car mode though, Speedbreaker
has a chance to catch up. "Well, now we have an idea of who our enemies
are" Speedbreaker says, looking towards Wildrider. He still had that stupid
grin, although it was now not complete. "Dosent that hurt", asks
Speedbreaker, "Naw, trust me, those Maximals will hurt worse soon, when we
get some reinforcements" Wildrider jests. As they near the end of the ocean
Speedbreaker starts to worry, "There are three new signatures at our base,
their not any of the new Decepticons". Wildrider replies, in still the
joking tone "The Maximals, they must be pretty ticked of what we did" as he
flies he pulls out his gun, "well they'd better be ready, I got a score to
settle", he rumbles, for the first time his smile replaced by a grimace, as
they close in on base.
